member.name: ID2D1GradientStopCollection1.GetBufferPrecision
member.summary: Gets the precision of the gradient buffer.
member.returns: The buffer precision of the gradient buffer.

member.name: ID2D1GradientStopCollection1.GetColorInterpolationMode
member.summary: Retrieves the color interpolation mode that the gradient stop collection uses.

member.name: ID2D1GradientStopCollection1.GetGradientStops1
member.summary: Copies the gradient stops from the collection into memory.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a one-dimensional array of structures.
The number of gradient stops to copy.

member.name: ID2D1GradientStopCollection1.GetPostInterpolationSpace
member.summary: Gets the color space after interpolation has occurred.
member.returns: This method returns the color space.

member.name: ID2D1GradientStopCollection1.GetPreInterpolationSpace
member.summary: Gets the color space of the input colors as well as the space in which gradient stops are interpolated.
member.returns: This method returns the color space.

member.name: ID2D1GradientStopCollection1
member.summary: Represents a collection of objects for linear and radial gradient brushes. It provides get methods for all the new parameters added to the gradient stop collection.
